attributes.action: Provide tax incentives or rebates for green technologies such as domestic solar-water heaters and wind turbines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To install a solar-water heater, wind turbine, etc is expensive and will take decades to repay the installation cost: too long for most families to afford to wait. But with govt incentives they can save emissions *today* and be made cheap enough for widespread adoption.
